ComicInfo.Title: The Greeting Card King; The J.R. Gift Catalogue for the Super Rich; Aluce; How Modern Inventions Would Have Changed History; The Ziggy Stardopple Handbook to Tennis; The 15 Warning Signals of Hypochondria; The Psychiatrists; New Products to Make Kids Feel Even More Like Adults; One Evening in a Posh Midwestern Restaurant; Dull vs. Exciting; M.A.S.H.E.D
ComicInfo.Summary: Boring vs. exciting examples of: Sports, Dating, Places to live, Amusement park rides, Food, Hobbies, Reading material, Toys, Teachers, Parties, Vacations, TV. Two illustrations per subject one dull one exciting.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 22:38:33. [Issue ID 250543]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Charlie Rodrigues,Bill Ward,Warren Sattler,John Severin,Sam Whitehead,Catherine Severin,Val Mayerik,Sururi Gümen
ComicInfo.Inker: Charlie Rodrigues,Bill Ward,Warren Sattler,John Severin,Sam Whitehead,Catherine Severin,Val Mayerik,Sururi Gümen
